The aide, Andy Coulson , had edited News of the World, Britain's biggest-selling Sunday newspaper, until 2007 and shortly after was hired by David Cameron . Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement. The resignation is a blow for David Cameron who had repeatedly backed Andy Coulson against calls for his resignation, saying earlier this week that everyone deserved a`` second chance.''
